title: T206 Ty Cobb green portrait for sale
author: Brass23

posts.post_title: T206 Ty Cobb green portrait for sale
posts.post_content:
Hello my name is Doug and I am looking to sell my PSA 4 Ty Cobb Green Portrait
[url]http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=4&u=17829358[/url]
[url]http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=3&u=17829358[/url]

I am asking $2450 as I see them on ebay for $3000. Thanks
Paypal gift or postal money order accepted (to avoid 3%)

Email [url]kilaartist@aol.com[/url]
Doug you might have better luck putting this in the auction section. Start it out as 1 dollar and let the bidding begin. Then create two additional net54 accounts and continue to drive up the price.
